name: Carrot Apple Turmeric Juice
description:
Juicing is a ritual that keeps my soul nourished and my body balanced. If you haven't tried this combo before, it's great for all sorts of reasons..my favorite reason? It tastes great while filling my body with tons of vitamins and naturally treats inflammation.

For Full Recipe Scan QR Code

Recipe & Photos By: Dr. Akala Lemus, D.C.
9/16/2018

Ingredients: 

6 carrots
1 apple
1" piece of fresh turmeric


Method:

The Jack LaLanne juicer model I have is not made anymore, however, I did find a similar model. There are tons of juicers out there, and there are many different types. I have had mine for >10 years, it's a great juicer, what else can I say?

After juicing ingredients in a juicer, strain juice to remove any pulp that passed through the juicer. And then serve as a shot of health in a jar!
